channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: @toddsieling Since school boards are often a springboard to council, and they own/manage a lot of real estate, I make sure I know who the trustee for my area is, what they stand for, etc.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling Since school boards are often a springboard to council, and they own/manage a lot of real estate, I make sure I know who the trustee for my area is, what they stand for, etc.

item.description: Hello ironing collared shirts, my old friend.

item.description: @davidpleonard I donated in memory of Teva, whom I didn’t know, but who I know loved and was loved, and in memory of my late mother (ditto). Fuck cancer.
item.source:markdown: @davidpleonard I donated in memory of Teva, whom I didn’t know, but who I know loved and was loved, and in memory of my late mother (ditto). Fuck cancer.

item.description: @nealjennings When you move there, can you write an article about how much you love Portland for @pdxphiles?
item.source:markdown: @nealjennings When you move there, can you write an article about how much you love Portland for @pdxphiles?

item.description: @Celadon_kate Toronto’s Department of Sunsets does good work, but I still think that Vancouver’s Department of Sunsets is the best in the biz. https://t.co/G1ccbuURKX

item.description: I forgot that solo software developers don’t care about feature requests.
item.source:markdown: I forgot that solo software developers don’t care about feature requests.

item.description: @PortmanDoe As far as I can tell, Covie is definitely ovie everywhere except for airplanes and airports, and, from what I hear, hospitals.
item.source:markdown: @PortmanDoe As far as I can tell, Covie is definitely ovie everywhere except for airplanes and airports, and, from what I hear, hospitals.

item.description: @coachmike66 @gruber @daringfireball Sarcasm is addictive. One can be against something and find it to be a habit that’s hard to shake at the same time.
item.source:markdown: @coachmike66 @gruber @daringfireball Sarcasm is addictive. One can be against something and find it to be a habit that’s hard to shake at the same time.

item.description: @davewiner @rtanglao Here’s a screenshot. Happy to use something else (email, GitHub) to write it out longer than 280 characters. https://t.co/QP5Ci776KS

item.description:
@rtanglao @davewiner What’s the best way to send feedback?

First feedback from me: The underlying URL of the feed (the href) should be the feed itself, otherwise people will share the XML Viewer URL, like Roland did. It could just be a separate field.
item.source:markdown:
@rtanglao @davewiner What’s the best way to send feedback?
First feedback from me: The underlying URL of the feed (the href) should be the feed itself, otherwise people will share the XML Viewer URL, like Roland did. It could just be a separate field.

item.description: https://t.co/HwkOcN9idw is still around, and someone I know still know still uses it. Amazing.
item.source:markdown: https://t.co/HwkOcN9idw is still around, and someone I know still know still uses it. Amazing.

item.description:
@jeffjedras Oh man, I’m jealous that you got to see it. Such a great finish.

Yeah, the Elam Ending is so great. Some people don’t like that it can end on a free throw, but that makes free throws exciting! And, free throws need to be part of your repertoire in an Elam Ending league.
item.source:markdown:
@jeffjedras Oh man, I’m jealous that you got to see it. Such a great finish.
Yeah, the Elam Ending is so great. Some people don’t like that it can end on a free throw, but that makes free throws exciting! And, free throws need to be part of your repertoire in an Elam Ending league.

item.description: @stuiemclaren @ianhanomansing I’m on Team #NeverRecline, but I would consider reclining if I knew the person behind me was doing it. 🤔
item.source:markdown: @stuiemclaren @ianhanomansing I’m on Team #NeverRecline, but I would consider reclining if I knew the person behind me was doing it. 🤔

item.description:
I’m watching from the other side of the country. Let’s go @HM_HoneyBadgers! 🦡 https://t.co/dGr3G399c7

Always stay till the end.

I love the Elam Ending so much. Basketball fans in the major leagues (WNBA and NBA) are going to love it when they put it in place. https://t.co/cC3DBcKVhI

LFG! https://t.co/EfxzbMHGpc

The Elam Ending makes it possible to win on a free throw, but you know what? Maybe that that makes the most boring part of basketball a little more exciting, and will encourage players to work in improving their free throw percentage. https://t.co/oGYzmAWBSU
item.source:markdown:
I’m watching from the other side of the country. Let’s go @HM_HoneyBadgers! 🦡 https://t.co/dGr3G399c7
Always stay till the end.
I love the Elam Ending so much. Basketball fans in the major leagues (WNBA and NBA) are going to love it when they put it in place. https://t.co/cC3DBcKVhI
LFG! https://t.co/EfxzbMHGpc
The Elam Ending makes it possible to win on a free throw, but you know what? Maybe that that makes the most boring part of basketball a little more exciting, and will encourage players to work in improving their free throw percentage. https://t.co/oGYzmAWBSU

item.description:
@ianhanomansing I never recline. I’d select a seat that doesn’t recline if it saved me a few dollars. Would the airline then charge a little more for the seat behind it?

The seats at the back of the plane usually don’t recline? I never want to be very last person off, though.
item.source:markdown:
@ianhanomansing I never recline. I’d select a seat that doesn’t recline if it saved me a few dollars. Would the airline then charge a little more for the seat behind it?
The seats at the back of the plane usually don’t recline? I never want to be very last person off, though.
